content.no:
"Shades of Yesterday" er en låt hentet fra det norske rockebandet Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up".
Spilt inn hos Dehli Musikk, Bø i Telemark og Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produsert av Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixet/mastret av Leif Johansen
Video av Jon Sandersen
Plateselskap: Pride & Joy Music
Musikere: Jan Thore Grefstad (vokal), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (gitar), Benjamin Dehli (tangenter), Chris Brush (trommer) og Per-Morten Bergseth (trommer i video)
content.en:
"Shades of Yesterday" is a track taken from Norwegian Classic Rock act Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up".
Recorded and engineered at Dehli Musikk, Bø in Telemark and Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produced by Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixed/mastered by Leif Johansen
Video by Jon Sandersen
Label: Pride & Joy Music
Musicians: Jan Thore Grefstad (vocals), Staale Kaasin (bass), Jo Henning Kaasin (guitar), Benjamin Dehli (keyboards), Chris Brush (drums) and Per-Morten Bergseth (drums in video)

thumbnailDescription: Benjamin Dehli, Ståle Kåsin and Jan Thore Grefstad

content.no:
Noen av de forskjellige keyboarddelene fra låta Wrong av Kaasin.
Trommene spilles av Chris Brush.
Lydene i videoen har blitt editert etter opptak.
F.eks. Den reverserte båndekkoen og de doblede Erebus spora.
Signalkjede for orgel: Hammond C3, Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275), VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr., Vox AC15H1TV og Shure SM57.
Signalkjede for synth på mellomspill, vers og refreng: Korg MS-20, Boss DM-2 Delay, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. og Roland Dimension D SDD-320.
Signalkjede for piano: Louis Zwicki Pianette, AKG C451E (Stereo par) og Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Signalkjede for synth på bridge: Dreadbox Erebus v2, Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. og Roland Dimension D SDD-320.
content.en:
Some of the different keyboard parts from the song Wrong by Kaasin.
The drums are played and recorded by Chris Brush.
The sounds in the video has been edited and altered after recording.
E.g. The reversed tape echoes and the double tracked Erebus.
Signal chain for organ: Hammond C3, Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275), VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr., Vox AC15H1TV and Shure SM57.
Signal chain for synthesizer on interlude, verse and chorus: Korg MS-20, Boss DM-2 Delay, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. and Roland Dimension D SDD-320.
Signal chain for piano: Louis Zwicki Pianette, AKG C451E (Stereo pair) and Fulltone Tube Tape Echo.
Signal chain for synthesizer on bridge: Dreadbox Erebus v2, Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man, VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr., Roland Dimension D SDD-320.

thumbnailDescription: Louis Zwicki Pianette, Hammond C3, Korg MS-20 and Dreadbox Erebus v2

title.en: A different kind of the ducking / pumping effect

content.no:
En alternativ og tungvint måte å lage ducking- / pumpeeffekten ved å bruke vekslende mikrofonavstand i stedet for side-chain-komprimering.
Instrumenter: Korg MS-20 (Mark 1 med Korg 35 filter).
Forsterker: Vox AC15H1TV.
Mikrofoner: Par med Shure SM57.
content.en:
An alternative and cumbersome way to create the ducking / pumping effect using alternating mic distance instead of side-chain compression.
Instruments: Korg MS-20 (Mark 1 with Korg 35 filter).
Amplifier: Vox AC15H1TV.
Microphones: Pair of Shure SM57.

thumbnailDescription: Guitar amplifier with microphones in front and the text "Mic distance: 2 meter"

name.en: Direct signal vs Alternating mic distance
Alternating mic distance in a mix
